entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Edmonton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:05 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Blatchford 6:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Friday night: Fog. Low minus 12.
